column5: 2015 at his home. he was born on june 14
column6: 1947 to the late blake and katherine free. he was a veteran of the united states army
column7: and retired from the big south fork national park. in addition to his parents
column8: he was preceded in death by his father and mother-in-law paul and ruth neal
column9: and his step-father forrest westfall. he is survived by his wife of 43 years janet neal free; daughter cynthia martin and husband darick; son paul blake free and wife debbie; brothers richard and craig free; sister darlene edmondson and husband lee; sister-in-law judy perkins and husband jerry and paula tilley and husband tim; grandchildren maribeth and husband david
column21: easton and trigger; several nieces and nephews and many other relatives and friends. friends may visit with the free family on monday
column23: 2015 from 6 p. m. until time of the funeral service at 8 p. m. in the chapel of jones & son funeral home with bro. donnie chambers and talon free officiating. graveside service will be on tuesday
column25: 2015 at 12 p. m. in the cooper memorial cemetery with full military honors provided by american legion post #136 of oneida. pallbearers will be darick martin
column29: david drinkard and kevin perkins; honorary pallbearers will be richard and craig free. jones & son funeral home is serving the family of mr. ronald free.
